TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CheckBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase

summary.span: 表示 Windows 。

span.span: Represents a Windows .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 为用户给定选项，如 true/false 或 yes/no。Use a to give the user an option, such as true/false or yes/no. 控件可以显示图像或文本。The control can display an image or text or both. 和 控件具有类似的函数：允许用户从选项列表中进行选择。 and controls have a similar function: they allow the user to choose from a list of options. 控件允许用户选择选项组合。 controls let the user pick a combination of options. 与此相反， 控件允许用户从相互排斥的选项中进行选择。In contrast, controls allow a user to choose from mutually exclusive options. 属性确定是否 以典型的 或按钮的形式出现。The property determines whether the appears as a typical or as a button. 属性确定控件是支持两种状态还是支持三种状态。The property determines whether the control supports two or three states. 使用 属性可获取或设置两个状态控件的值 ，并使用 属性来获取或设置三态控件的值 。Use the property to get or set the value of a two-state control and use the property to get or set the value of a three-state control. > [!NOTE] > 如果将 属性设置为 `true` ，则 属性将返回 `true` 处于选中状态或不确定状态的。If the property is set to `true`, the property will return `true` for either a checked or indeterminate state. 属性确定控件的样式和外观。The property determines the style and appearance of the control. 如果将 属性设置为 ，则用户的操作系统将确定控件的外观。If the property is set to , the user's operating system determines the appearance of the control. > [!NOTE] > 当 属性设置为时 ，将 忽略属性，并使用 或 对齐方式显示控件。When the property is set to , the property is ignored and the control is displayed using the or alignment. 如果将 属性设置为右对齐，则使用 对齐方式显示控件; 否则，将使用 对齐方式显示控件。If the property is set to one of the right alignments, the control is displayed using the alignment; otherwise, it is displayed using the alignment. 下面描述了一个不确定的状态：具有一个 ，它确定中的选定文本 是否为粗体。The following describes an indeterminate state: You have a that determines if the selected text in a is bold. 选择文本时，可以单击 以粗体显示所选内容。When you select text you can click the to bold the selection. 同样，在选择某些文本时，将 显示所选文本是否为粗体。Likewise, when you select some text, the displays whether the selected text is bold. 如果所选文本包含粗体和 normal 文本，将处于不 确定状态。If your selected text contains text that is bold and normal, the will have an indeterminate state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化 ，为其提供切换按钮的外观，将设置 为 `false` ，并将其添加到中 。The following code example creates and initializes a , gives it the appearance of a toggle button, sets to `false`, and adds it to a . [!code-cpp[Classic CheckBox.CheckBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckBox.CheckBox Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CheckBox.CheckBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckBox.CheckBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CheckBox.CheckBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckBox.CheckBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 value 设置为 ，则 具有典型的外观。If value is set to , the has a typical appearance. 如果将值设置为 `Button` ，则 显示为一个切换按钮，该按钮可切换到 "向上" 或 "向下" 状态。If the value is set to `Button`, the appears like a toggle button, which can be toggled to an up or down state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化 ，为其提供切换按钮的外观，将设置 为 `false` ，并将其添加到中 。The following code example creates and initializes a , gives it the appearance of a toggle button, sets to `false`, and adds it to a . remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示标签中三个属性的值。The following code example displays the values of three properties in a label. 属性在和之间 `true` 交替交替单击，并 `false` 在 `MiddleRight` 和值之间交替 `MiddleLeft` 。The property alternates between `true` and `false` with alternating clicks of the control and the alternates between the `MiddleRight` and `MiddleLeft` values of . 此示例演示属性值如何随 属性更改而更改，并检查控件。This example shows how the property values change as the property changes and the control is checked. 此示例要求在 窗体上实例化并已对其进行了 实例化，并且标签足够大以显示三行文本，以及对 命名空间的引用。This example requires that a , and have all been instantiated on a form and that the label is large enough to display three lines of text, as well as a reference to the namespace. 应在该 控件的事件处理程序中调用此代码。This code should be called in the event handler of the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值为 `true` ，则 控件的部分将显示复选标记。When the value is `true`, the portion of the control displays a check mark. 如果将 属性设置为 `Button` ，则当为时，控件将显示凹陷， `true` 并在时与标准按钮一起引发 `false` 。If the property is set to `Button`, the control will appear sunken when is `true` and raised like a standard button when `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示标签中三个属性的值。The following code example displays the values of three properties in a label. 属性将在 `true` 和之间 `false` 交替交替单击控件，并在 和的值之间交替 `MiddleRight` `MiddleLeft` 。The property alternates between `true` and `false` with alternating clicks of the control and the alternates between a value of `MiddleRight` and `MiddleLeft`. 此示例演示属性值如何随 属性更改而更改，并检查控件。This example shows how the property values change as the property changes and the control is checked. 此示例要求在 窗体上实例化并已对其进行了 实例化，并且标签足够大以显示三行文本，以及对 命名空间的引用。This example requires that a , and have all been instantiated on a form and that the label is large enough to display three lines of text, as well as a reference to the namespace. 应在该 控件的事件处理程序中调用此代码。This code should be called in the event handler of the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 属性设置为 `false` ，则 只能在代码中将属性值设置为， `CheckState.Indeterminate` 而不能由用户交互设置。If the property is set to `false`, the property value can only be set to `CheckState.Indeterminate` in code and not by user interaction. 下表描述了 控件在 `Normal` 和样式控件的不同状态下的 `Button` 。The following table describes the of the control in its different states for the `Normal` and `Button` style control . |CheckStateCheckState|外观。正常Appearance.Normal|外观 ... 按钮Appearance.Button| |----------------|-----------------------|-----------------------| |`Checked`|显示复选标记。The displays a check mark.|控件显示为凹陷。The control appears sunken.| |`Unchecked`| 为空。The is empty.|此时将显示控件。The control appears raised.| |`Indeterminate`|显示复选标记并灰显。The displays a check mark and is shaded.|该控件以平面显示。The control appears flat.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示标签中三个属性的值。The following code example displays the values of three properties in a label. 属性在和之间 `true` 交替交替单击，并 `false` 在 `MiddleRight` 和值之间交替 `MiddleLeft` 。The property alternates between `true` and `false` with alternating clicks of the control and the alternates between the `MiddleRight` and `MiddleLeft` values of . 此示例演示属性值如何随 属性更改而更改，并检查控件。This example shows how the property values change as the property changes and the control is checked. 此示例要求在 窗体上实例化并已对其进行了 实例化，并且标签足够大以显示三行文本，以及对 命名空间的引用。This example requires that a , and have all been instantiated on a form and that the label is large enough to display three lines of text, as well as a reference to the namespace. 应在该 控件的事件处理程序中调用此代码。This code should be called in the event handler of the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会更改 属性。The method changes the property. 如果将 属性设置为 `true` ，则后续单击 将导致 循环遍历枚举的所有值 。If the property is set to `true`, subsequent clicks of the will result in cycling through all the values of the enumeration. 否则， 在和之间切换 。Otherwise, switches between and . 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override bool ProcessMnemonic (char charCode);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance bool ProcessMnemonic(char charCode) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Function ProcessMnemonic (charCode As Char) As Boolean
protected public: override bool ProcessMnemonic(char charCode);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool ProcessMnemonic(char charCode) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function ProcessMnemonic (charCode As Char) As Boolean

span.span: The character to process.

summary.span: 处理助记键字符。

span.span: Processes a mnemonic character.

returns.span: 如果字符由控件作为助记键处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法是为了使控件有机会处理助记键字符。This method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character. 方法应确定控件是否处于用于处理助记键的状态，以及给定字符是否表示助记键。The method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic. 如果是这样，则该方法应执行与助记键关联的操作，并返回 `true` 。If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`. 如果不是，则该方法应返回 `false` 。If not, the method should return `false`. 此方法的实现通常使用 方法来确定给定字符是否与控件文本中的助记键匹配。Implementations of this method often use the method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text. 例如：For example: ```csharp if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ``` 此方法的默认实现 只是返回 `false` 以指示该控件没有助记键。This default implementation of the method simply returns `false` to indicate that the control has no mnemonic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个 button 类的扩展，该扩展会重写 方法以显示自定义行为。The following code example demonstrates an extension of the button class that overrides the method to exhibit custom behavior. 该示例还演示了 和属性的用法 。The example also demonstrates the use of the and properties. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到同一文件中的某个窗体类之后。To run this example, paste the following code after a form class, in the same file. 向窗体添加类型的按钮 `MnemonicButton` 。Add a button of type `MnemonicButton` to the form. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此 是否允许三种复选状态而不是两种。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the will allow three check states rather than two.

value.span: 如果 可以显示三种复选状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is able to display three check states; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 属性设置为 `false` ，则 只能将属性值设置为 `Indeterminate` 代码中的值，而不能设置为 用户交互。If the property is set to `false`, the property value can only be set to the `Indeterminate` value of in code and not by user interaction. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示标签中三个属性的值。The following code example displays the values of three properties in a label. 属性在和之间 `true` 交替交替单击，并 `false` 在 `MiddleRight` 和值之间交替 `MiddleLeft` 。The property alternates between `true` and `false` with alternating clicks of the control and the alternates between the `MiddleRight` and `MiddleLeft` values of . 此示例演示属性值如何随 属性更改而更改，并检查控件。This example shows how the property values change as the property changes and the control is checked. 此代码要求在 窗体上实例化并已对其进行了 实例化，并且标签足够大以显示三行文本，以及对 命名空间的引用。This code requires that a , and have all been instantiated on a form and that the label is large enough to display three lines of text, as well as a reference to the namespace. 应在该 控件的事件处理程序中调用此代码。This code should be called in the event handler of the control. [!code-cpp[Classic CheckBox.CheckAlign Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckBox.CheckAlign Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CheckBox.CheckAlign Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckBox.CheckAlign Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CheckBox.CheckAlign Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckBox.CheckAlign Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
